snippet: Retirees entering independent living communities often say they want active lives, but such places can come up short in trying to fulfill that desire.
abstract: Retirees entering independent living communities are leading a push for more structured and robust wellness and fitness programs that go beyond basic aerobics classes; people are living longer and are more aware of the importance of maintaining their health into old age, but say that many retirement communities fall short in that area.
lead_paragraph: Retirees entering independent living communities often say they want active lives, but such places can come up short in trying to fulfill that desire.

headline.seo: Fitness Regimens Go Well Beyond Shuffleboard
